Super nice material and very elegant!

My daughter in law loved the look of this giant sized bracelet, so I ordered it for her to check out. It is quite heavy, and very well made. It opens and closes with a hinge on the back, which works well.  Color is a beautiful, shiny yellow gold.  It's large for her wrist (good to know if you are on the bigger side). Between that and the fact that it's so heavy, it does spin around constantly.  She recommends it, especially if you do not have a petite sized wrist.

This bracelet is really cute, both in the package and on the arm. It is packed well, and comes with a velvet gift bag for safe storage. This may seem excessive, but the teardrop detail to each end of the bracelet has a lot of surface area, which could easily get scratched up if you just toss it in with other jewelry. The hinge is easy enough to pull apart to put it on the arm, and the bracelet stays in place very nicely. It is very heavy, so you won't forget that you're wearing it, and it's large enough to be quite noticeable. This would look nice in both casual and dressy occasions. This is a great valueable addition to a costume jewelry collection.

Easy to slide onto wrist, it’s a standard size. I imagine it should fit anyone with a wrist size up to 7”, which is what most standard bracelets/bangles fit. Great find, wish they had one in silver for stacking. I definitely like it!
This bracelet was a bit pricey, but there was a reason for that. The bracelet was well made . It looks very elegant and expensive.

I was looking for something with gold and silver. This bracelet outs very pretty. I saw so many reviews talking about how difficult it was to get on. The bracelet comes with directions, and it was very easy to get on as far as I was concerned, I recommend.

Looks really elegant with any clothing… however it’s not easy to put on.

The bracelet is exactly as shown in the picture. The gold actually looks believable. The bracelet is heavy and feels solid. Due to its sturdiness, it does take a little strength to pull the two sides apart to put it on. Since I did not want it to bend or possibly break, I gingerly opened it just enough to slide it onto my wrist. For the money, it is a good value. I really hope that the gold tone does not fade, as long as I keep it away from water and/or moisture. This bracelet is also the perfect accompaniment to a ring that I purchased from Amazon. The two items together really makes quite a statement. The bracelet was nicely packaged in a gift box.
Happy with the purchase.
I love this bracelet!  It looks just like the picture.  It has a nice weight to it.  It is great quality for  a low price.
It’s a beautiful bracelet, it’s a little difficult to get it off your wrist but still love it .

This bracelet is very stylish, chic & has some weight to it. It is adjustable & the perfect shade of 18K gold. I had a compliment on my "real gold bracelet". It is worth every penny.

Pretty but I feel that I would have to Force it open in order to put it over my wrist, possibly breaking it in the process. I bought two of these, one for a gift. If I don't return them, I may give them to people with narrow hands.
